scripts.build:fast: rm -rf dist && webpack --config webpack.build-resources.config.js && yarn run build:preprocessor && webpack --config webpack.package-resources.config.js
scripts.build: yarn run lint && yarn test && yarn run build:fast
scripts.build:prod: yarn run lint && yarn test && rm -rf dist && webpack --config webpack.build-resources.config.js --mode production --devtool none && yarn run build:preprocessor && webpack --config webpack.package-resources.config.js --mode production --devtool none
